extendedInfo.description: The Channel 4 News App is now available on your Android phone.All the most popular features will be streamed in the most accessible way for your device. Watch the week's programmes with Catch up, find out what's caught the attention of Jon and Krishnan through Snowblog and Gurublog and explore our award-winning domestic and international journalism. Features: - All the latest top domestic and international news stories, plus the most important news from the worlds of politics, science and technology, business and culture from the Channel 4 News team of correspondents and reporters. - All the Channel 4 News blogs, including Cathy Newman's FactCheck and new blogs from Alex Thompson, Matt Frei and Michael Crick. - Catch up - to watch video of the last seven days from the Channel 4 News at 1900 and noon programmes. You can use Wi-Fi or 3G connectivity to update your App and read articles offline.

reviews.title: Good but not without issues
reviews.comment: Whenever you pause or lock the phone while playing a video it startsplaying anyway regardless. Also it would be useful for videos to flow into eachother when watching news shows, instead of having to stop and start.
reviews.author: Max Hardcore

reviews.title: Doesn\'t refresh content reliably
reviews.comment: I can\'t find a way to get this app to get NEWS updates properly, on 2 phones the content is several days old. Also the app has not been updated this year, C4 should do better
reviews.author: Keith Te

reviews.title: Love the program hate the app
reviews.comment: The app never refreshes and doesn\'t have the option to refresh manually. Consequently I cannot see todays news. Very frustrating
reviews.author: Duncan Petrie

reviews.title: Great for catching up
reviews.comment: Love being able to watch Channel 4 news wherever I am to catch up on the day\'s news - even abroad. Splitting it up like they do just helps me skip to the stories I want to watch. Perfect!
reviews.author: Alex Gemmell

reviews.title: Excellent content
reviews.comment: Like the style. Easy to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Frustrating...
reviews.comment: Very annoying, you have to log in every time.
reviews.author: Jonathan Pollard

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: Keeps causing my phone to freeze and needs a shortened URL and title to make plausible to share on twitter.
reviews.author: Barry McComish

reviews.title: Memory hog
reviews.comment: Uses a lot of memory & cannot be moved to your SD card :-(
reviews.author: David Brazendale

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.comment: But not quite enough variety of content and too few news updates, although is definitely the best news app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No connection
reviews.comment: Kept saying I had to connect to internet but I was
reviews.author: Barry Bell

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Use
reviews.author: Lee Mat

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Videos dont play!
reviews.author: Mohummed Majarally

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Channel 4 News is by far my favourite source of news while I\'m in the UK. Fantastic journalism, fantastic presenting and this just adds to it with a fantastic app. Why on earth people use Sky News apps as their source of news I\'ll never know. It\'s like comparing The Sun to The Guardian.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for my tablet
reviews.comment: No auto rotate, thin blog/story columns on 10 inch galaxy tab. Faq unreadable. If it wasn\'t for the uncomfotably small text I\'d keep it as the video is alright.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but
reviews.comment: could do with more regular news updates like what bbc and sky currently manage. Come on channel 4!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: At last
reviews.comment: Long overdue great app.....thanks C4!!!!  Will we get a come dine with me app too?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 stars but could be improved
reviews.comment: Fantastic to have my favourite news program out of the UK. My only gripe is the portrait format for the app. It would be nice to have landscape option as I\'m on a tablet so app flips from portrait to landscape when watching video.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No Good HTC HD
reviews.comment: Freezes..... No access.... E mail password not recognized Re installed over 4 times useless unlike the TV version each night which is great hence really disappointed....back to boring BBC news..sorry!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Come on Jon sort it out lad!!
reviews.comment: Never used to have an issue, it is slow and is now to sporadic in updating. Hopefully an update\'s on its way.........
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BBC Rival.
reviews.comment: Better than the BBC, CNN and Sky News combined because it\'s got great video.
reviews.author: A Google User
